name: Headlines from the Deep
description:
A short, PS1-style adventure game about fish-based media production, developed for the Haunted PS1 Summer of Shivers Jam.

There once was a diver, out at sea...

In a harse storm one night, they became detached from their boat

Mistaken for a fish, they're taken to the offices of Coral News...


Credits

Code, Level Design & UI: MenacingMecha

Character Art: ToonTatsu

Sound & Audio Design: PKCrane

Dialogue: Ewan Morgan

m6x11 font by Daniel Linnsen

SBH2B font by frankqbe (CC-BY 4.0, no changes made)
